title: Stella Smart Beauty Awards 2019: We reveal our 15 winning beauty products of the year
text:
With a beauty industry that’s bursting at the seams with launches, from luxury products to high-performing budget buys and make-up heroes, whittling our 75 shortlisted products down to a top tier of 15 must-haves is a tough gig (honest!).

So we asked some of the industry’s most influential women to join us on our judging panel: legendary make-up artists Mary Greenwell and Ruby Hammer MBE, and co-founders of top lifestyle blog A Style Album, Emma Rose Thatcher and Louise Redknapp.

Our shortlisted products were put through their paces by each and every judge. We were also joined by you, our readers: 6,000 of you voted for your favourite ageless skincare product in our Readers’ Choice category....
